plot: Maggie will not go to sleep, so Homer tells her a bedtime story about when the Simpsons and the Flanders went to the Grand Canyon together.

When Maggie won't go to sleep homer tells her a story about the time when he and Flanders went on a vacation on the Grand Canyon but when there tour guide falls off the ledge - they are lost alone. In this episode we see the Simpsons and Flanders bond in times of crisis.
